snippet.title: PRIM - Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Back PRIM on Kickstarter NOW: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/prim-game/prim-a-2d-adventure-game-about-deaths-daughter



The dead cat's out of the bag! We're making PRIM, a creepy-but-cute 2D Point'n'Click Adventure Game.
A first demo is supposed to be released in 2019. For more information check out 
www.prim-game.com.

We'd love to keep you posted - go hit the SUBSCRIBE button and let us know in the comments what you think about the look and mood of the game so far!

Video credits:
PRIM was created by JONAS FISCH
Video by CHRISTOPH POHL
Art by OSKAR ALVARADO (www.facebook.com/oskar.alvarado.98)
Music by BRYAN ATKINSON (www.bryanatkinson.net)

#adventuregames #pointandclick #2Dart #indiedev #indiegame #madewithvisionaire
